lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic has criticized Bernard Tomic for giving up on match point in a loss at the Madrid Open this week, saying the young Australian player is lacking commitment to the sport.
snippet: Novak Djokovic has criticized Bernard Tomic for giving up on match point in a loss at the Madrid Open this week, saying the young Australian player is lacking commitment to the sport....

headline.main: Djokovic Criticizes Tomic for Giving Up on Match Point
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Criticizes Tomic for Giving Up on Match Point
